snippet: M. Manuel Sanchez Ocana is deputed to draw up the portion of the bill which relates to the settlement of the home debt. The recruiting operations are over in most part of the provinces; they have been conducted with much regularity and uniformity....
lead_paragraph: M. Manuel Sanchez Ocana is deputed to draw up the portion of the bill which relates to the settlement of the home debt. The recruiting operations are over in most part of the provinces; they have been conducted with much regularity and uniformity.
